about.title: About Me
about.content: Passionate front-end developer with 2 years of experience building modern web applications. Skilled in React ecosystem and committed to creating exceptional user experiences. Looking to leverage my technical expertise and creativity in a challenging front-end role.

current.title: Front-end Developer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained multiple React-based web applications
Collaborated with design team to implement responsive UI components
Improved application performance and loading times by 40%
